name: Together (Amaze2020)
description:
Description 

We control three simultaneous characters in two different game environments in which we will challenge the control system to try to survive the maximum number of characters. 

Developers (Art, Programming and Design): 

Carlos Santigosa, Guillermo Castilla, Alejandro Borreguero.

Amaze 2020 Candidature:

We wanted to raise two games on the same mantle of design that relates them. In the playable concepts we orbit on the idea of the urgency and sensation of no control when having to handle or act on three independent bodies and how the loss of one/two of them makes the game simpler but the condition of closest defeat.
